caption.p: Geographical distribution of mtDNA COI haplotypes (657â€‰bp fragment of the COI) of BMSB in native countries - ( a) China, and ( b) Japan. Provinces where BMSB was collected from are shaded in grey. The size of pie is proportional to the frequency of haplotypes. Each colour represents a different haplotype. The figure was generated using Tableau 2019 ( https://www.tableau.com/) [ 34]
